publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Zechariah 3
ab.l: Da ḱorǵuźd́u maja Johošuaʿny ol koheń gadol- nu turadyr alnynda malʾaḫynyn H-nyn da ol Šatan turaŕedi on janyndan az- ɣyrtma any.
Da ajtty H ol Šatanɣa ačuvlanɣej H śeńd́a ėj Šatan da ačuvlanɣej H śeńd́a ol sajlavču Jerušalajimni muna bu ḱuśov́ kibik qutulɣan ottan.
Da Johošuaʿ ėdi kijińǵań jerińči upraḥlar da tura- ŕedi alnynda ol malʾaḫnyn.

Da qaruv b́erdi da ajtty ol turuvčularɣa
alnynda ket́arijiź ol jerińči upraḥlarny üśt́uńd́ań da ajtty anar ḱor ašyrdym jazyɣyjny üśt́ujd́ań da kijdirdim saja č́eb́ar upraḥlar.
Da ajttym qojsunlar aruv čalma bašy üśt́uńa da qojdular ol aruv čalmany bašy üśt́uńa da kijdirdiĺar anar upraḥlar da malʾaḫy H-nyn turaŕedi.
Da tanyḥlyḥ ėt́ti malʾaḫy H-nyn Johošuaʿɣa ajtadoɣoč.

Bolej ajtty Jehova jaratuvču č́evaʾotnu ėger jollarym byla barsej da saqlavymny saqlasej da daɣy śeń jarɣu jararsyn juv́umńu da ėger saqlasej azbarlarymny da b́erirmiń saja saja qajjamlyḥlar arasyna ol qajjam malʾaḫlarnyn ol turuvčularnyn al.- nymda.
Tynlaɣyn ėńdi Johošuaʿ ol koheń gadol śeń da dostlaryj ol olturuv- čular alnyjda ki biĺgili ėĺ alar ki muna ḿeń keĺtirirmiń qulumnu mašijaḥny.

Ki muna ol taš ki b́erdim alnynda Johošuaʿnyn bir taš üś- t́uńa bolur ḱop t́urśuńĺar muna ḿeń tuǯururmyn tuǯurmaɣyn anyn alej ajtty H jaratuvču č́evaʾotnu da bošatyrmyn jazyɣyn ol jerniń bir ḱuń- d́a.
Ol ḱuńd́a alej ajtty H jaratuvču č́evaʾotnu ińd́arĺar kiši dostuna bir borlalyḥ t́ub́uńa da bir ińǯirlik t́ub́uńa.

app.note: F305-90: the copyist has written this word twice by mistake and indicated it by surrounding the second one with dots.
